t: What was your first haircut in America like?
When I moved to Brooklyn from Korea, my first haircut
was from an Uzbekistani Immigrant who owned a store in my neighborhood
I recall having a bad experience there, as his style was very different from that which I was used to in Korea.
It brought up the question of how I can filter through the many barbershops in Brooklyn,
and find a stylist i'd be able to communicate with, and comfortably approach
Once our team started trying to assess that problem, we came up with the idea for ClippR.
